services.name: Champagne Spa Manicure
services.description: Luxurious spa manicure with champagne-infused treatments. Pamper your hands with this indulgent experience.
services.fullDescription: Indulge in our signature Champagne Spa Manicure featuring champagne-infused products that nourish and rejuvenate your hands. This luxurious treatment includes nail shaping, cuticle care, exfoliation, massage, and polish application for perfectly manicured nails.

services.name: French Manicure
services.description: Classic French manicure with elegant white tips. Timeless sophistication for your hands.
services.fullDescription: Achieve timeless elegance with our classic French Manicure. This sophisticated treatment features perfectly shaped nails, cuticle care, and the iconic white tips with natural pink base that never goes out of style.

services.name: Paraffin Spa Manicure
services.description: Spa manicure with paraffin wax treatment. Deep moisturizing therapy for soft, supple hands.
services.fullDescription: Experience ultimate hand hydration with our Paraffin Spa Manicure. This treatment includes a warm paraffin wax dip that deeply moisturizes, softens rough skin, and leaves your hands feeling incredibly smooth and rejuvenated.

services.name: Regular Manicure
services.description: Essential manicure service with nail shaping, cuticle care, and polish. Perfect for maintaining beautiful nails.
services.fullDescription: Our Regular Manicure provides essential nail care including shaping, cuticle treatment, buffing, and your choice of polish. A great way to keep your nails looking neat and polished.

services.name: Regular Pedicure
services.description: Essential pedicure service for healthy, beautiful feet. Includes nail care, exfoliation, and massage.
services.fullDescription: Our Regular Pedicure provides comprehensive foot care including nail trimming and shaping, cuticle treatment, exfoliation, massage, and polish application. Perfect for maintaining healthy, beautiful feet.

services.name: French Pedicure
services.description: Classic French pedicure with elegant white tips. Sophisticated style for your toes.
services.fullDescription: Elevate your pedicure with our French Pedicure featuring the timeless elegance of white tips and natural pink base. Includes complete foot care, exfoliation, massage, and the classic French polish application.

services.name: Gel Manicure
services.description: Long-lasting gel polish manicure. Chip-resistant shine that lasts up to 2-3 weeks.
services.fullDescription: Experience the durability of our Gel Manicure with professional gel polish that provides a high-gloss, chip-resistant finish lasting up to 2-3 weeks. Includes nail prep, shaping, cuticle care, and gel application with UV/LED curing.

services.name: Gel Pedicure
services.description: Long-lasting gel polish pedicure. Durable, chip-free toes for weeks of perfection.
services.fullDescription: Enjoy weeks of perfect toes with our Gel Pedicure. This treatment combines complete foot care with long-lasting gel polish that resists chipping and maintains its beautiful shine for 2-3 weeks.

services.name: Paraffin Spa Pedicure
services.description: Luxurious spa pedicure with paraffin wax treatment. Deep moisturizing for incredibly soft feet.
services.fullDescription: Indulge in our Paraffin Spa Pedicure featuring a warm paraffin wax treatment that deeply moisturizes and softens your feet. This luxurious service includes complete foot care, exfoliation, massage, and polish for ultimate pampering.

services.name: Manicure + Pedicure
services.description: Complete hand and foot care combo. Perfect pairing for head-to-toe beauty.
services.fullDescription: Get the best of both worlds with our Manicure + Pedicure Combo. This comprehensive service provides complete care for both your hands and feet, including nail shaping, cuticle care, exfoliation, massage, and polish application.

services.name: Russian Manicure
services.description: Precise Russian manicure technique with e-file. Meticulous cuticle work for perfectly clean nails.
services.fullDescription: Experience the precision of our Russian Manicure, a meticulous technique using an e-file for detailed cuticle work. This advanced method provides perfectly clean nail beds, extended polish longevity, and an impeccably polished finish.
